introduction.description: 17 year old from Ireland. Aspiring software and mechatronics engineer. Active gym goer and such. I am an extremely overworked Software Engineer, always looking for the next challenge.
introduction.chatPrompt: For Q&A, start a chat with Friendly Tech Support

escalation.text: If you need anything urgent, contact me directly on
